title: HA0-QN601-UPSHUR / HAMILTON COMMUNITY PARKS
description: DPR will plan and design improvements to these two parks. The redesigns will address the changing needs of the community and provide new recreational amenities. The initial scope of this project is to develop plans and create designs for these sites. The second phase will be capital improvements to the parks.
justification: Funding in FY 2013 will allow DPR to fulfill capital improvements discussed in the FY 2009 planning efforts.
progress_assessment: Planning will be complete in FY 2009 with construction to follow in FY 2013.
